text: Sarkis Asatovich Sarchayan (born 1947), is a male former international table tennis player from Georgia. He won a silver medal at the 1975 World Table Tennis Championships in the mixed doubles with Elmira Antonyan. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists Category:Sportspeople from Batumi
title: Sarkis Sarchayan
